content.raw:
This diff makes it work for me:

~~~
diff -r 4819d329b7cd cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake
--- a/cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake	Fri Jul 14 22:31:18 2017 +0000
+++ b/cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake	Tue Sep 26 09:59:13 2017 -0700
@@ -33,7 +33,7 @@
 find_package(PkgConfig REQUIRED)
 pkg_check_modules(jsoncpp jsoncpp)
 
-if (NOT JsonCpp_FOUND)
+if (NOT jsoncpp_FOUND)
   BUILD_ERROR ("Missing: libjsoncpp-dev. Required for parsing json data.")
 endif()
~~~
content.html:
This diff makes it work for me:

diff -r 4819d329b7cd cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake
--- a/cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake    Fri Jul 14 22:31:18 2017 +0000
+++ b/cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake    Tue Sep 26 09:59:13 2017 -0700
@@ -33,7 +33,7 @@
 find_package(PkgConfig REQUIRED)
 pkg_check_modules(jsoncpp jsoncpp)

-if (NOT JsonCpp_FOUND)
+if (NOT jsoncpp_FOUND)
   BUILD_ERROR ("Missing: libjsoncpp-dev. Required for parsing json data.")
 endif()
